exercises.title: Identifying Healthy Eating Habits
exercises.question: Read each statement and classify it into the correct category.

rows.text: Eating five servings of fruits and vegetables daily.
Avoiding sugary drinks and opting for water instead.
Cooking meals at home instead of eating processed foods.

exercises.explanation: Understanding different aspects of healthy eating can improve overall well-being.

exercises.title: Classifying Historical Events
exercises.question: Match each event with its correct historical period.

rows.text: The fall of the Berlin Wall in 1989.
The signing of the Declaration of Independence in 1776.
The construction of the Great Pyramid of Giza around 2560 BCE.

exercises.explanation: Classifying events by their historical period helps in understanding their significance in context.

exercises.title: Sorting Tech Innovations
exercises.question: Identify the correct category for each tech innovation.

rows.text: The development of the first smartphone in 1992.
The invention of the steam engine in the 18th century.
The launch of the Hubble Space Telescope in 1990.

exercises.explanation: Categorizing tech innovations highlights the diversity of technological advancements.
